pageTitle: Lapsa: Latvian MP Zakis avoids paying EUR 8,800 VAT on purchase of new automobile :: The Baltic Course | Baltic States news & analytics
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {2786=After this, Zakis signed an agreement with his own company that the new automobile will be given to him to use while he remains a parliament member in the 11th Saeima.
